item.title: Preview of New Metallica Song!
item.description: For those that know me, you probably know I’m a big Metal fan, and with that comes being a Metallica fan (at least in my book it does). Here is a video from the recent Ozzfest of their new song, Cyanide.

item.title: Molson Beer Commercials
item.description:
For those that haven’t seen them, you need to check out the series of commercials for Molson Canadian beer. Funny stuff.

  • Chasing Beaver
